about_the_game:
Wild searching is a strategy game with ten game levels designed.

Player need to evade injuries from harmful animals and keep both health value and physical strength value above zero. Female leading role is rescued when five boss monsters are all defeated. Luckily,three pets with unique Recovery Capacity are willing to help. A puzzle of insert flags into grassland to find clue needs to be solved before the current level boss monster to show. Player can move to the block where boss monster located and press space key to attack him or make a strategy to kill him faster according to his fight method and movement rule. Ground worm Boss can be hurt by stake which is sold in the middle of the map. Wind Boss blow down stakes and gopher Boss place bombs. Stakes and bombs can make or evade damages, also they can be captured and replace in any place.

A scoring system is designed to calculate total score by evaluate achievement of total steps, time cost in the rescue, Evasion of injury, etc. Player get more than 70 points in normal difficulty game mode is considered as react faster and with better memory.
